text: (Ej mū'minon) ʙipursed Parvardigoratonro ʙo zorivu iltiço va pinhonu pūşida, to ki du'ojaton az rijo dur ʙoşad. Hamono Alloh dūst nadorad az had guzarandagonro. (Buzurgtarin az had guzarandagon, onhoeand, ki dar vaqti du'o kardan ʙo Alloh şarik meorand. Ba monandi talaʙ kardan az murdaho va ƣajra)
